Name: TurretCraft
About the game: Build maze, send units, destroy your opponents! TurretCraft is a competitive tower defense game with multiplayer, mazing, and mercenaries. In TurretCraft, two teams play against each other. Each player in both teams are given a large open area to build their defense and have to hire mercenaries to attack the other team. Key Features Multiplayer - 3vs3, 2vs2, 1vs1 Mazing - no predefined building spots Mercenaries - spend gold to attack & increase income 40 turrets in 10 different groups. 20 of them are upgradable. 39 mercenaries Two teams, South and North, compete against each other in TurretCraft. Teams can have 1 to 3 players. Players have to build their defenses, and purchase mercenary to attack the other team. Each mercenary bought will increase the income of the player, thus players have to balance defense and attack spending. This allows a fast paced, competetive game from first minute to the end.
